hero.title: Calm, client-led coaching for real-life change
hero.subtitle: A steady, non-directive space to think clearly, choose next steps, and move at your pace.

items.d: Co-create a realistic plan to re-enter with confidence.
Reflect on norms, choices and practical moves in context.
Turn uncertainty into small, testable next steps.
Rebuild rhythm with gentle structure and accountability.

steps.d: We clarify aims, boundaries, consent and fit.
Typically 4-6 sessions of 50-60 minutes. You lead; we partner to evoke awareness and options.
We reflect on learning and agree what support you want next.
